Ingredients.1: 1 (6 ounce) can chunk light tuna, drained

Ingredients.4: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.5: 3 leaves green lettuce, rinsed and patted dry

Ingredients.6: 2 tablespoons finely shredded low-fat Cheddar cheese (Optional)

Directions.1: Combine tuna, mayonnaise, onion, salt, and pepper in a bowl.

Directions.2: Lay lettuce leaves out. Divide tuna mixture among the leaves, placing it in the middle of each leaf. Sprinkle Cheddar cheese over the tuna. Roll leaves up to create wraps.
